supportingMedia.value: Juniper SIRT is not aware of any malicious exploitation of this vulnerability.

exploit.value: Juniper SIRT is not aware of any malicious exploitation of this vulnerability.

description.value: CWE-755 Improper Handling of Exceptional Conditions

supportingMedia.value: The following software releases have been updated to resolve this specific issue: Junos OS: 20.4R3-S9, 21.2R3-S7, 21.3R3-S5, 21.4R3-S5, 22.1R3-S4, 22.2R3-S3, 22.3R3-S2, 22.4R3, 23.2R1-S2, 23.2R2, 23.4R1, and all subsequent releases.

solution.value: The following software releases have been updated to resolve this specific issue: Junos OS: 20.4R3-S9, 21.2R3-S7, 21.3R3-S5, 21.4R3-S5, 22.1R3-S4, 22.2R3-S3, 22.3R3-S2, 22.4R3, 23.2R1-S2, 23.2R2, 23.4R1, and all subsequent releases.

work_around.value: While not a workaround, the number of stuck mgd processes can be monitored and once they reach a high level they can be proactively terminated.
